span.b: The VCS Web site has MOVED! This site is old and for internal school use ONLY. Please point your bookmarks and browsers to http://www.vcsvikings.org OR http://vcs.aos92.org

div.p: VCS has a new website! Point your web browser to www.vcsvikings.org OR vcs.aos92.org to access our new web site. Please change your bookmarks to go to the new web site. The old web site (this one) will be "decommissioned" on January 31st.

November 30th marked the date of the Rags to Riches Dance at VCS! The kids dressed up in either "rags" or "riches". Many students were very creative with their clothing choices. Everyone had a blast and did it up "Gangham Style"! :-)
If you're in school, click here to see the rest of the pictures

a.style: clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;

div.p:
Winter 2012-13 Basketball & Cheering tryout schedules have been posted to the VCS Events Calendar.
Tryouts begin Tuesday November 13th. Please see detail times and dates posted on the calendar above.
What a great dance! Fantastic costumes! A new school record in donut eating....and more! And...we did it "Gangham Style!" Check out the pics by clicking here!

The VCS boys' playoff soccer game vs Palermo
has been postponed.
The game has been rescheduled for Monday
October 22 at 2:45 at VCS.

Posted October 18th, 2012
Boys Soccer Playoff Game
Date: Friday October 19th
Location: Vassaboro Community School
Time: 4:00 PM
The VCS Boys soccer team will
play Palermo.
Girls Soccer Playoff Game
Date: Monday October 22nd
Location: Vassaboro Community School
Time: 4:00 PM
The VCS Girls soccer team will
play Chelsea.

Monday October 15th, 2012
Soccer Game location changed from
Chelsea to VCS.
3:30 Boy's
approx. 4:45 Girls

h3.a: Picture Retakes will be on Tuesday October 16th.

div.p:
Picture retakes are scheduled for Tuesday October 16th
not October 12th as published on picture packets.

The NutriKids payment system is back online for VCS parents.
Please use the link on the right navigation
titled Online Lunch Payments or go to
www.myschoolbucks.com
Users will need to bookmark this new address for
future use.
Upon initial log in you will need to follow
the instructions to establish an account.
Before you begin the process you will need your child's student ID#.
If you don't already have your child(ren)'s ID
you can get their ID number by calling the VCS main office at 923-3100
or by calling the AOS #92 Nutrition office at 873-5758.
Payments made on-line can take up to 24 hours to process.
